name: Agency Starter
description: Professional agency design with services, projects, testimonials, and FAQ.

seo.description.label: SEO Description
seo.description.default: Agency Starter is a modern creative agency layout showcasing services, portfolio highlights, testimonials, and a clear contact call-to-action.

hero.subtitle.label: Subtitle
hero.subtitle.default: We help modern teams launch stand-out experiences that convert, retain, and delight customers across the product lifecycle.

hero.imageAlt.label: Hero Image Alt
hero.imageAlt.default: Creative team collaborating in a sunlit studio

services.heading.label: Heading
services.heading.default: Strategy, design, and growth under one roof

services.description.label: Description
services.description.default: From venture-backed startups to global enterprises, our cross-functional team builds momentum by connecting insight, creativity, and measurable results.

services.itemOne.description.label: Service One Description
services.itemOne.description.default: Clarify your story, voice, and identity to resonate with high-value audiences.

services.itemTwo.description.label: Service Two Description
services.itemTwo.description.default: Design intuitive digital products that activate users and accelerate retention.

services.itemThree.description.label: Service Three Description
services.itemThree.description.default: Launch campaigns, nurture journeys, and experiments that create compounding impact.

portfolio.description.label: Description
portfolio.description.default: A glimpse at recent collaborations spanning SaaS, climate tech, fintech, and consumer experiences.

portfolio.itemTwo.alt.label: Project Two Alt
portfolio.itemTwo.alt.default: Team reviewing design concepts on wall

testimonials.heading.label: Heading
testimonials.heading.default: Trusted by teams building category-defining brands

testimonials.featuredQuote.label: Featured Quote
testimonials.featuredQuote.default: The Prosite team has been instrumental in shaping our roadmap and bringing a cohesive brand vision to life across every touchpoint.

testimonials.itemOne.quote.label: Testimonial One Quote
testimonials.itemOne.quote.default: From kickoff to launch, their process kept us aligned and the work exceeded every stakeholder expectation.

testimonials.itemTwo.quote.label: Testimonial Two Quote
testimonials.itemTwo.quote.default: We saw a 2x lift in qualified pipeline within the first quarter. They understand design as a growth lever.

testimonials.itemThree.quote.label: Testimonial Three Quote
testimonials.itemThree.quote.default: An incredible partner for complex product initiatives. Their experimentation program keeps us shipping smarter.

testimonials.itemThree.author.label: Testimonial Three Author
testimonials.itemThree.author.default: Daniel Price · Head of Growth, Vector

faq.description.label: Description
faq.description.default: Planning a partnership? Here are the details teams ask before onboarding.

faq.itemOne.question.label: Question One
faq.itemOne.question.default: How quickly can we kick off a new project?

faq.itemOne.answer.label: Answer One
faq.itemOne.answer.default: Discovery begins within two weeks of contract signature. We also support expedited timelines depending on scope.

faq.itemTwo.question.label: Question Two
faq.itemTwo.question.default: Which industries do you specialize in?

faq.itemTwo.answer.label: Answer Two
faq.itemTwo.answer.default: Our team partners with SaaS, fintech, climate innovation, B2B marketplaces, and mission-driven consumer brands.

faq.itemThree.question.label: Question Three
faq.itemThree.question.default: Do you offer ongoing support after launch?

faq.itemThree.answer.label: Answer Three
faq.itemThree.answer.default: Yes—we offer retainers for optimization sprints, experimentation, and creative support to maintain momentum.

contact.description.label: Description
contact.description.default: Share your goals and we’ll craft a tailored roadmap for launch, acceleration, and long-term growth.

contact.formDescription.label: CTA Description
contact.formDescription.default: Pick a time that works for your team and we’ll prepare an agenda tailored to your priorities.

footer.note.label: Footer Note
footer.note.default: Built with craftsmanship and curiosity from our Portland studio.
